attributes.action: Petition to withdraw discussions regarding the Communications Data Bill with immediate effect
attributes.additional_details:
The Communications Data Bill seeks to bring about the end of online privacy as we all know it. The Home Office, more specifically Mrs May, has promoted this dangerous bill in favour of the supposed benefits it will bring against criminals, however, we all should not be forced to pay for their crimes with our privacy.

This bill outlines policies that require Internet Service Providers and communications companies to withhold information regarding your calls and discussions online.

Help us end this bill here and now.
